courseDescription:
Are you looking to develop a career in sports medicine or become a team physician? Or are you seeking information on the type of drugs and medication commonly used by athletes to overcome injuries? As medicine evolves, so do treatment options for athletes who experience a plethora of injuries and conditions requiring state-of-the-art treatment. This course introduces you to the term ‘sports medicine’ and provides a brief history of medicine in sports and how it has evolved into the vast field it is today. Then you will learn about a team physician's crucial role and responsibilities. Essential qualifications and requirements for a team physician shall also be listed and identified.

Do your medical qualifications make you a good fit for an athlete or a sports team? We explore the types of career opportunities that are available in the world of sports medicine. The modern athlete is not only limited by physical challenges but also psychological ones. We shall examine all these aspects in detail before identifying the most common types of medication used to treat the hardships of overcoming injuries. You can also never underestimate the part diet and nutrition play in an athlete's preparation. The use of science to ensure that the athlete takes in the correct level of calories, proteins and fats is paramount for optimal athletic performance. We analyse the role of diet and nutrition in ensuring a long and healthy professional career.

How do competitors handle performing at an optimal level at high altitudes? We will investigate all these climatic conditions and the effect of oxygen levels, extreme hot or cold temperatures or diet intake in various locations. Are you curious about which type of scan is necessary for a particular injury? Examine several imaging techniques at the medical community's disposal, making treatment safer and more practical for an athlete. Analyse the various types of drugs used under clandestine arrangements to enhance performance. Finally, examine the future of sports medicine as it is a continuously evolving field. With technology at the forefront of almost every area, medicine in sports is no exception. This course is here to help you get all the information you need to understand the dynamics of this field. So don't waste any more time and take your learning journey forward.
